item.title: Nginx目录密码认证
item.description: 原服务器nginx配置 全部采用https 开启了目录浏览功能 server { listen 80; server_name pic.fooleng.com; # 如下为自动转发https设置 rewrite ^(.*) https://$server_name$1 permanent; } server { listen 443 ssl http2; server_name pic.fooleng.com; location / { root /data/pic.fooleng.com; # 图
